page.title: 14GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: In summer the boys play marbles. You can play for lends or for keeps. If you play for lends, everybody gets back their own marbles at the end of the game. If you play for keeps the person who wins the game keeps all the marbles for himself. The best game of marbles is Chocker where you have to roll the marbles into a hole. The first person to get all the marbles into the hole wins the game. The girls play skipping. Sometimes you just skip on your own. If you do it very fast it is called Peppers. But it is best when you have a long rope with two people turning it and everybody has a go at running in and skipping. There is a hard game called Double Dutch when two ropes are turned at the same time going in different directions. It is very hard.
